name: Hellclimb
description:
You're stuck in hell with broken wings and no way up.
Use the lord's holy blessing to vanquish hell's demons and climb their corpses back to heaven.

"Carpal tunnel free!! Just hold down the mouse button." 

Made by Andreas Clement Holmgaard
Made for Create Jam Fall 2021 with the theme "Mythology" and the challenge "Overworld and Underworld"

Assets Used:
A simple platformer controller and Audio system from older projects.
Button Icons from https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
Sounds are from freesound or generated with https://sfxr.me/
Title text was made with https://eu1.flamingtext.com/net-fu/jobs/27492669542124566.html
